text: Mikhail Andreyevich Plaksin (Russian: Михаил Андреевич Плаксин; born 1929) is a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's coxless pair where they were eliminated in the round one repêchage. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Mikhail Plaksin
